name: Milestone 1 - Project Initiation
description: Defines the official start of the project and confirms team setup and responsibilities.

name: Milestone 2 - Requirements Defined
description: All business and technical requirements are reviewed

name: Milestone 3 - Design Approved
description: System and UI designs are finalized and validated with stakeholders.

name: Milestone 4 - Prototype Completed
description: A working prototype is delivered for early validation and user feedback.

name: Milestone 5 - Development Complete
description: Core functionalities have been implemented and are ready for testing.

name: Milestone 6 - Integration Tested
description: Integration between all modules and systems has been successfully tested.

name: Milestone 7 - User Acceptance Test
description: End users have validated that the solution meets business needs.

name: Milestone 8 - Go-Live Preparation
description: All go-live checklists and deployment activities are completed.

name: Milestone 9 - Go-Live
description: The system is officially deployed into production and made available to users.

name: Milestone 10 - Project Closure
description: All documentation and lessons learned are finalized and project is formally closed.
